pkgmetadata.longdescription: Regression Analysis of Sparse Asynchronous Longitudinal Data // Estimation of regression models for sparse asynchronous longitudinal observations, where time-dependent response and covariates are mismatched and observed intermittently within subjects. Kernel weighted estimating equations are used for generalized linear models with either time-invariant or time- dependent coefficients. Cao, H., Li, J., and Fine, J. P. (2016) doi:10.1214/16-EJS1141. Cao, H., Zeng, D., and Fine, J. P. (2015) doi:10.1111/rssb.12086.
